data.text: @jackiesreading Thank you! Hope you have a lovely time at the show tomorrow ❤️

@TheStuCummins It is odd, so far I have avoided it but have hardly been out in two years except in and out of hospital. But I do have a show to go see tomorrow which was supposed to be seen in May 2020. So 🤞🤞🤞daughters mother in law had it but no one else in her household. Glad you well now.
@jackiesreading It’s so strange isn’t it! Thankfully I didn’t spread it, but I tried my best to isolate away and wore a mask inside at all times
@TheStuCummins My friend was positive for ages as well . It’s weird how some have it longer than others. Glad you are now negative dud anyone else in your household get it?
@TheStuCummins Oh you poor love!!! Fingers crossed for normality!!

@LV_matthews It really has! Thankfully I’ve been ok throughout, with very mild symptoms (mainly tiredness and headache).
I’ve worn a face covering the whole time to try and curb spreading it, so it’s been amazing to breathe again!! 😄❤️
@TheStuCummins My gosh!!! That’s taken forever!! Are you ok?
